akas: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (original title)
akas from release info: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (original title)

1.title: Berry Double Trouble

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

1.plot: Raspberry and Lemon want to join a fashion contest. They offer Strawberry to be their model, but she is too busy running both her café and the market. Raspberry and Lemon meet the twins Sweet and Sour Grapes, whose names fit their personalities, and offer them to replace Strawberry in the café. The twins bicker about their cooking, until Strawberry persuades them to work together.

2.title: Berry Bitty Adventurer

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

2.plot: Apple Dumplin' comes to visit her cousin Strawberry. Soon she causes troubles: she installs a light/music display in Strawberry's bedroom, but cannot turn it off; later she causes a power failure. After Apple leaves, it is revealed that she fixed the power. Strawberry goes after her and persuades her to stay at Berry Bitty City.

3.title: High Tech Drama

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

3.plot: Lemon and Raspberry make the final preparations for the contest. Strawberry offers the twins to be models at the contest instead of her. Sweet is delighted, but Sour is not excited. Shortly before the show is broadcast, Sour sabotages the TV equipment. As a result, the broadcasting starts ahead of schedule, showing the audience the girls in very awkward scenes, trying to finish the preparations. After realizing what happened, the girls are saddened, thinking that they have been made a laughingstock. Sour regrets ruining the show and confesses. She is ready to leave ...

4.title: A Berry Merry Birthday

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

4.plot: The twins' birthday is approaching. Sour says she does not wish to share the birthday with Sweet. Sweet is sad that her sister feels that way, but respects her wish. Sour initially enjoys having a birthday of her own and the activities the Berry girls plan for her, but gradually feels lonely without her sister, and regrets what she said earlier. Eventually the twins celebrate their birthday together, to the delight of everyone.

5.title: Tall Tale Trio

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

5.plot: The Berry girls go on their annual camp-out. Cherry, Plum and Orange become tired on the way to the camping site and stop to rest. When they catch up with the other girls, each of them has a different version of the adventure they had.

6.title: Berry Big Tale-Teller

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

6.plot: Sour implores Sweet to help her recount the Adventures they had in the Berry Deep Dark Forest, but her performance is so embellished that Sweet can't keep up.

7.title: The Berry Bitty Great Race

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

7.plot: At the camping site, Apple tells a story about the great race she participated and won, although the other competitors cheated and did their best to stop her by using dirty tricks.

8.title: The Berry Best Taste Test

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

8.plot: Apple's rave review of Strawberry's dessert encourages the Queen of Berryvania to order her new cake for her ball.

9.title: The Berry Best Biscuit

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

9.plot: Sour and Apple begin a prank war and they are sentenced in a Berry Bitty City-style trial to camp alone together for a whole weekend.

10.title: Hot Sauce Cook Off

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

10.plot: Berrykin Bloom's braggart cousin, Berrykin Bertram, has won the hot sauce competition at the local county fair year after year, but this year, Sour and Apple are determined to help the kindhearted Bloom win.

11.title: The Berry Bitty Dance Disaster

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

11.plot: Apple joins Plum's ballet class. When she realizes she is not as good as the others, she decides to make a pair of dancing shoes which she calls "Groove Booties". But they escape and wreak havoc in the town. Apple must find a way to stop the Booties before they ruin the Berryball game.

12.title: Doggie Dance No-Show

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

12.plot: Apple makes improved Groove Booties that can teach anyone to dance, including the puppies Pupcake and Pitterpatch. This gives Plum the idea to put on a show of dancing dogs. She asks Huckleberry if Tom Tom would like to participate, and he agrees. Tom Tom enjoys dancing when he and Huckleberry are alone, but soon it becomes clear he does not like dancing before an audience. Strawberry notices that, and convinces Huckleberry that Tom Tom should not be pressured into doing something he does not feel comfortable about. Eventually, Plum performs the show with Pupcake and ...

13.title: Dance Puppy Dance

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

13.plot: Apple and Plum ask Cherry to compose a music to the video of the dancing dog show, that it can be uploaded to Apple's website. Cherry is very busy writing a song for the queen of Berryvania, but takes a break to do as they ask her. Apple uploads the video with the new-composed song "Dance Puppy Dance", and soon it becomes a great hit, that many of Berry Bitty City play and sing it often. Cherry becomes angry, because the she cannot write her next song for the queen while listening to her last song, and cannot find a quiet place to work. She grows to hate the song and ...

1.title: Fish Out of Water

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

1.plot: Orange finds a small fish and takes it home. Soon it reveals to be a tadpole, and grows very fast. Orange devotes all her time to her new pet that she neglects her friends. The frog keeps growing and causes troubles and inconvenience to the whole neighborhood. Orange tries to amend things and make everyone happy, but the frog is displeased with his living conditions. Finally, Strawberry makes Orange realize that the best thing she can do for the frog is to return him to his natural home.

2.title: A Stitch in Time

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

2.plot: Plum Pudding secretly tries to help Raspberry Torte when she can't make a decision on how to stitch Strawberry Shortcake's new dress.

3.title: The Vanishing Violets

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

3.plot: Several violets disappear mysteriously from Lemon's flower bed. After more flowers disappear from other beds, the girls conduct an investigation to find out who is the culprit.

4.title: Babysitter Blues

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

4.plot: Something strange has been going on and, Strawberry along with her friends, soon find out that Baby Berrykin is causing all the madness. Strawberry offers to take care of Baby Berrykin but soon discovers that it is difficult.

5.title: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

5.plot: Lemon Meringue buys a machine to make hair-styling faster and better, but soon feels left out and sad, and worries her job might be over for good.

6.title: Pop Goes the Garden

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

6.plot: Blueberry plants seeds of what is supposed to be daisies, but turned to be corn. The plants grow to huge size and the ears fall on the ground, making it unsafe for everyone. The girls decide to take the corn ears away from the village and make popcorn, but on the way one of the ears roll down the hill, and it falls into a crevice with Strawberry and Blueberry. They find themselves in an underground cave with steam geysers. By placing the corn seeds on the steam vent, the girls make popcorn and get themselves out. The girls and the Berrykins celebrate the popcorn party.

7.title: The Berry Best You Can Bee

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

7.plot: When a delivery bee is sick, Strawberry offers to help Postmaster Bumble-Bee deliver a special birthday package to Berry Bitty Dale.

8.title: Strawberry's House Pests

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

8.plot: Strawberry offers Jadeybug to host her cousins Sadiebug and Kadiebug at her café. Soon she regrets this because Sadiebug and Kadiebug are very mischievous, help themselves with everything, causing a lot of mess and damages to everyone.

9.title: Berry Bitty World Record

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

9.plot: The girls join a contest of breaking world records, to win a vacation for Berrykin Bloom.

10.title: Too Cool for Rules

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

10.plot: Plum Pudding starts making up weird rules at her dance studio.

11.title: Berry Best Berryfest Princess

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

11.plot: The story of "Rapunzel", with a twist. Princess Rapunzel (Rainbow Sherbet) has always preferred being called Rap and liked doing things her way.

12.title: Strawberry's Berry Big Parade

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

12.plot: Strawberry Shortcake has always dreamed of seeing a certain rare flower, which only blooms once every ten years - and then only for a day. When she and her friends decide to go to see the flower, they load up a car and a camper and set out for a long journey.

13.title: The Berry Best Choice

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

13.plot: Strawberry and her friends are looking for the magical Wanderberry.

14.title: Nothing to Fear But Berries Themselves

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

14.plot: Orange becomes scared during a blackout, thinking that the Galumpalot is lurking outside. Her friends assure her that the Galumpalot does not exist, but her fear soon catches them too. Strawberry helps Orange overcome her fear.

15.title: Where, Oh Where has Our Blueberry Gone

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

15.plot: When Strawberry gets an urgent plea to return to Oz, she finds that there's an environmental disaster in the works. The much-loved Gem-Berries (whose glow lights the whole Land of Oz) are fast-disappearing.

16.title: Manners Meltdown

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

16.plot: It's that time of year when the berries are about to burst into bloom - and it looks like this is going to be a bumper crop!

17.title: Trading Sizes

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

17.plot: Raspberry finds a way to enlarge Berrykins to the same size as Strawberry and her friends.

18.title: Different Waltz for Different Faults

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

18.plot: Plum invents a new dance for the dancing competition and persuades her friends to join. The dance proves to be too complicated and the rehearsals are exhausting, and that takes the fun of the whole thing. Soon Plum's friends are in no shape to perform. At Strawberry's suggestion, Plum asks the Berrykins to replace her friends. The Berrykins do not take the dance seriously, but Plum listens to Strawberry and lets them perform as they wish. Plum joins them, and they end up the winners much to everyone's joy.

19.title: Happy First Frost

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

19.plot: Blueberry gives a First Frost Day gift that's more what she wants than the recipient.

20.title: A Circle of Friends

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

20.plot: The whole village is busy with preparations for the upcoming Glimmerberry Gathering. Strawberry cleans her café for the First Frost celebration, finds an old box containing a book about the first winter in Berry Bitty City, and reads it to her friends. The story reveals the reason for the custom of carving Glimmerberries. The girls are fascinated by the idea, and decide to make their own Glimmerberry designs. However, they are upset to find out their designs are all the same, and accuse each other of copying. Strawberry shows everyone that the particular design is ...

21.title: The Glimmerberry Ball

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

21.plot: Plum finds an ideal location for the Glimmerberry Ball, but two chipmunks keep crashing her party.

22.title: Nice as Nails

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

22.plot: Lemon Meringue comes up with clever idea on a new manicure called "The Glamicure". It starts out as fun and musical, but soon the embedded music and lights start to drive everyone crazy.

23.title: How You Play the Game

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

23.plot: A new game comes to Berry Bitty City that starts to encroach on the town's other activities.

24.title: Good Citizens Club

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

24.plot: Strawberry Shortcake's friendship letter to children around the world elicits an invitation from Crepes Suzette to visit Pearis and the Pieffel Tower.

25.title: Team for Two

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

25.plot: Lemon and Raspberry must work together to make a Day Care Center for the Baby Berrykins.

26.title: Lost and Found

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

26.plot: Pupcake and Custard meet a gopher, play with him and lose track of time. Strawberry becomes worried as the hours pass and her pets do not return home, and goes with her friends to look for them.

1.title: The Berry Big Harvest

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

1.plot: Strawberry goes to the field to pick strawberries and sunflower seeds. She notices a strange thing: the flowers, fruit and vegetables are smaller than usual. Berrykin Bloom tells her it is his latest invention. The problem is that now there are so much fruit and vegetables, that there is not enough room to store them in Orange Mart. Soon it turns to be a mess that spreads all over the village. Strawberry comes up with the idea to open a market for selling the fruit and vegetables.

2.title: Room at the Top

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

2.plot: Strawberry's friends volunteer to decorate and furnish her unfinished upstairs room. Unfortunately, each of them does her share according to her own taste, and perfumes the room with her favorite scent. The outcome is a mixture of styles, colors and scents. Strawberry is dissatisfied but pretends happy, because she does not want to sound ungrateful and hurt her friends' feelings. Later, Strawberry offers Princess Berrykin a piece of pineapple cake, but the princess declines graciously. The princess explains that she does not care for pineapple, but thanks Strawberry ...

3.title: Starlight, Star Bright

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

3.plot: The girls invite their favorite singer Cherry Jam to Berry Bitty City. They do their best to make her stay pleasant as possible. Cherry, however, finds the quiet and modest Berry Bitty City much better place to be than the Big City, where is always committed to a busy schedule, surrounded by fans and has no privacy. She reveals that she wishes the girls to treat her as her friends rather than fans.

4.title: Practice Makes Perfect

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

4.plot: Cherry grows so fond of the quiet and friendly Berry Bitty City and its nice inhabitants, that she decides to stay more and become the music teacher. All her students progress well, and she puts on a recital at the weekend. Plum becomes nervous because the drumsticks keep slipping from her hands when she plays, and makes up excuses to postpone the recital. Strawberry understands that Plum has a stage-fright, and helps her to gain confidence.

5.title: Top Talent

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

5.plot: The girls hold a talent show.

6.title: A Star Is Fashioned

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

6.plot: Raspberry receives a job offer from the Fashion Design Department in Berry Big City. Her friends are excited and happy at the news, except Cherry who acts strangely reserved. Raspberry is unsure whether Cherry is jealous of her. Soon after Raspberry travels to the Big City, she informs her friends that she will have a studio of her own, and that they want her to move to the City. The girls are saddened but decide to be supportive and throw a goodbye party for Raspberry. Raspberry arrives to pack her belongings with the Ladybug Miss Mavis Maraschino. The girls are ...

7.title: No Blueberry Is an Island

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

7.plot: Blueberry overhears Strawberry speaking while writing an essay for a magazine contest, incorrectly thinks that she plans to take all the girls to a vacation on a tropical island, and tells that to the other girls. When Blueberry discovers her mistake, she cannot bring herself to disappoint the other girls, and makes up excuses for canceling the vacation, but for no avail. Finally Blueberry reveals the truth, but as things turn to be, the girls win a vacation after all.

8.title: Where the Berry Breeze Blows

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

8.plot: The girls are excited of the vacation they are going to spend at Berry Breezy Bay Hotel, unfortunately the resort is closed for bad weather. Orange comes up with the idea of making their own resort in their city. The other girls think the project is overly ambitious, but they assist Orange. The girls enjoy the work, but Orange keeps insisting that their resort should be exactly like the Berry Breezy Bay Resort, and this takes the fun out of the project and upsets the other girls. Strawberry explains Orange that the important thing is that they have fun. Orange admits ...

9.title: The Berry Best Vacation

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

9.plot: The girls are preparing for the vacation, when Miss Mavis Maraschino suddenly shows up to interview Cherry. Soon Mavis gets on everyone's nerves with her rude and noisy behavior, and they devise a plan to make her leave.

10.title: The Berry Long Winter

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

10.plot: Spring comes early, and everyone is disappointed that winter has gone too soon. To cheer her friends up, Strawberry suggests to play "Capture the snowman's nose", using the snow cone machine to make snow. Suddenly winter returns. The people of Berry Bitty City vote whether or not to share their food with the wildlife.

11.title: The Big Freeze

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

11.plot: Blueberry is waiting impatiently for the book she ordered, but the post is delayed due to the bad weather. She improvises "Icy Skites" that are steered by butterflies, and gets the desired book despite the weather. Soon she receives a call from a sports store, offering her to manufacture the Icy Skites, and also want her to make a commercial. Blueberry's friends help her with ideas for the commercial.

12.title: On Ice

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

12.plot: Raspberry and Berrykin Bruce are planning a spring fashion show and a water show, but the preparations of each event interrupt the other. Strawberry suggests they combine the shows, and they agree. However, winter suddenly is back, freezing the water and foiling both shows. Berrykin Earl suggests to have a winter ice-skating fashion show.

13.title: On the Road

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

13.plot: The girls form a musical band and decide to go on a concert tour to Berry Big City. They are all excited, except Orange who has misgivings about leaving their town and finds excuses to return, till Strawberry convinces her that the tour will be fun and they will soon return.

1.title: A Boy and His Dogs

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

1.plot: Huckleberry arrives at Berry Bitty City with puppies for adoption. The girls befriend with Huckleberry and adopt the puppies.

2.title: Partners in Crime

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

2.plot: Blueberry invites Huckleberry to write a detective story together. She tells him to write down her own ideas, and does not listen to his. The next days, Huckleberry evades Blueberry. She is sad and upset to find out that he spends much time with Cherry, and they write and compose a song together. Strawberry reveals to Blueberry that song is actually written for her, to show her that Huckleberry too can write well. Blueberry realizes she did wrong by not letting Huckleberry add his own ideas to the story. She apologizes to Huckleberry, and he apologizes for the ...

3.title: The Mystery of the Disappearing Dog Show

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

3.plot: Blueberry and Huckleberry try to gather money for building a shelter for homeless dogs. They send a detective story to Berry Bitty Mysteries, but it is rejected. Strawberry suggests to hold a dog show to raise funds. Due to several misunderstandings, no one comes to the show. Huckleberry and the girls are disappointed when suddenly they are told by the editor of Berry Bitty Mysteries that their new story is accepted.

4.title: Snowberry and the Seven Berrykins

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

4.plot: Plum reads in a magazine about the show "Snowberry and the Seven Berrykins" that is held at the Big City, and decides to make bigger stage show. She puts too much effort in the directing, causing much stress to everyone.

5.title: Berryella and Prince Charming

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

5.plot: The girls prepare to stage the play "Berryella and Prince Charming".

6.title: The Littlest Berrykin

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

6.plot: Blueberry and Huckleberry narrate a play about three princesses, Strawberrita, Lemonella and Raspbelina. The king and queen intend to retire. In order to decide which of the princesses will succeed them, they give them a task: to bring the royal golden berry. Each of the princesses chooses a Berrykin to escort her, Strawberrita chooses the smallest. The bratty Lemonella and Raspbelina act rudely and nastily to whoever they meet. The kind and gentle Strawberrita acts politely and generously, and follows the advices of her tiny escort.

7.title: The Berry Big Relay Race

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

7.plot: At Strawberry's suggestion, the girls and their puppies hold a relay race that takes place in the lake, land and air.

8.title: The Berry Best Treasure

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

8.plot: The Berrykins are fixing the power cables, what causes a lot of noise and inconvenience to everyone in the village. The girls go out of the village till the work is complete, and play treasure hunt.

9.title: The Berry Scary Fun Adventure

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

9.plot: The power failure at the village is not fixed yet. While the Berrykins are working on it, the girls go on a camping trip for the night. They have fun, but various items keep disappearing mysteriously from the camp.

10.title: The Berry Lucky Day

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

10.plot: The puppies run around and cause a lot of damage and inconvenience to everyone. The girls decide to build a dog park, and ask Huckleberry to help the Berrykins build it. Huckleberry agrees hesitantly because his construction skills are poor, but he is too embarrassed to admit it. The work does not progress well. Huckleberry finds a lucky charm, which unknown to him belongs to Cherry. With the lucky charm in possession, Huckleberry's construction skills improve greatly. He also becomes successful at sport competitions. Meanwhile, heartbroken Cherry looks for her lost ...

11.title: All Dogs Allowed

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

11.plot: The new dog park is open, but something scares the puppies and they refuse to enter. The girls try different solutions: to lure the puppies inside with treats; perfume the park; behave like dogs; paint the park with various colors; but everything fails. Finally the girls realize that the puppies are scared of their new hats designed by Raspberry. Once Raspberry changes the decorations of the girls' hats, the puppies delightfully enter the park.

12.title: A Basket of Blue Berries

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

12.plot: Blueberry invites Huckleberry to the masquerade ball. Unfortunately, she becomes sick. Lemon and Raspberry, worrying that Huckleberry will be disappointed of Blueberry's absence, disguise themselves as Blueberry, without telling each other. Unknown to them, Blueberry recovers thanks to Strawberry's tea and comes to the ball. The presence of three Blueberries at the ball causes a lot of confusion to everyone. To add to the confusion, Berrykin Bruce overhears Huckleberry's new idea of detective thriller, and thinks incorrectly that he plans to steal Princess Berrykin's ...

13.title: The Berry, Biggest, Berry Baddest Bakeoff

episode of.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures (TV Series 2009–2015)

13.plot: Berrykin Bloom manages to grow a new fruit - a combination of watermelon, pineapple and strawberry. Princess Berrykin announces that as a reward for his achievement, a ceremony will be held for him. Strawberry suggests that the girls will bake special cupcakes for Berrykin Bloom, and they agree excitedly. Due to a misunderstanding, the girls get a bit carried away, each of them tries to outdo the others by baking a gigantic cake instead of a cupcake.

imdb.title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
plot: A girl named Strawberry and her friends go on thrilling adventures.
synopsis: What if there was a miniature world hidden in your very own garden? Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty World is like that, a secret world that might be in any childs back yard. Its a wonderful place we wish we could visit. The kind of place that makes us feel that maybe, if we look for it in just the right way, we might even find it!The new Strawberry Shortcake is a comedy/educational CG series of 22-minute episodes for girls ages 3-6. The series focuses on the quirky community of Berry Bitty City, a miniature town tucked into a strawberry patch. It is home to Strawberry Shortcake and her five girlfriends, all nine years old and two inches tall. The series teaches social/emotional lessons and Emotional Intelligence lessons on community life that will benefit our young audience. The series is also fruit forward Strawberrys earlier series has evolved from a world plentiful with cake and candy to one that now emphasizes fruit, vegetables and healthy eating. Colorful, whimsical fruit motifs are used in visuals and naming conventions.
